ROOT:
-- DaoCustomers_S3_Update -- 2014/2/9 日立 太郎 UPDATE [Customers] SET
[CustomerID] = @Set_CustomerID_forUPD, [CompanyName] = @Set_CompanyName_forUPD, [ContactName] = @Set_ContactName_forUPD, [ContactTitle] = @Set_ContactTitle_forUPD, [Address] = @Set_Address_forUPD, [City] = @Set_City_forUPD, [Region] = @Set_Region_forUPD, [PostalCode] = @Set_PostalCode_forUPD, [Country] = @Set_Country_forUPD, [Phone] = @Set_Phone_forUPD, [Fax] = @Set_Fax_forUPD,
WHERE [CustomerID] = @CustomerID
